cu.explanation_en: Setting phy_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause physical layer log configuration parsing failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP to 8 exceeds the valid range (typically 1-4) and will cause PDSCH antenna port configuration errors leading to downlink transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP 設定為 8 超過有效範圍（通常為 1-4），會導致 PDSCH 天線埠配置錯誤並造成下行鏈路傳輸失敗。
